name: Waterloo Region - Public Health and Emergency Services
comment:
Sexual health clinic * health professionals test for and treat sexually transmitted infections * family planning services
  • birth control
  • pap smears for youth and adults up to 24 years
  • post-therapeutic abortion follow up
  • sexually transmitted infection (STI) testing
  • treatment for genital warts (HPV)
  • assessment, treatment, education, and referrals for sexual health issues
